SELECT t1.id AS id, t1.business_no AS businessNo, t1.patient_name AS patientName, t1.allergy AS allergy, date_format(t1.nursing_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS nursingTime, t1.is_morning_care AS isMorningCare, t1.is_pressure_ulcers_care AS isPressureUlcersCare, t1.is_evening_care AS isEveningCare, t1.output AS output, t1.input AS input, t1.mental_state AS mentalState, t1.person_in_charge AS personInCharge, t1.hospital_diagnosis AS hospitalDiagnosis, t2.building_name AS buildingName, t2.floor_name AS floorName, t2.room_name AS roomName, t2.bed_name AS bedName FROM bus_special_nursing_record t1 LEFT JOIN bus_hospital_record t2 ON t1.business_no = t2.business_no AND t2.is_del = 0 AND t2.status = '0' WHERE t1.is_del = 0
AND t1.nursing_time >= to_timestamp(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
AND t1.nursing_time <= to_timestamp(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
ORDER BY t2.building_code, t2.floor_code, t2.room_code, t2.bed_code
